message.content:
The most likely category for this paper would be "Toys & Games" (7) because it is discussing a card game. 

The second most likely category would be "Books" (5) because it is providing information about a specific card game and its rules.

The third most likely category would be "Sports & Outdoors" (4) because it involves a competitive game that can be played outdoors.

The fourth most likely category would be "Home & Kitchen" (1) because it is a game that can be played at home.

The fifth most likely category would be "Office Products" (19) because it involves a game that can be played in an office or workplace setting.

prompt:
Title: Racko Card Game - 50th Anniversary
Content: Like many card games, Rack-O is part skill, part luck of the draw. Two to four players try to get their rack of 10 cards in consecutive order, from lowest to highest, first. The cards are numbered from 1 to 60, and each player takes a turn by drawing and discarding. Bonus Rack-O points are earned when a player gets a perfect run of three or more cards. The first to rack up 500 points wins. The rule book doesn't suggest variations, but more challenge can be added by having to get certain number p...
